name: Athena CP
body:
### Welcome to Athena Control Panel webpage.
This is a forked project from the original (non-renewal) Flux Control Panel. The purpose for this repository is to create/update a control panel that has renewal elements built in. The content will mainly be guided by the progress of rAthena, an open-source renewal emulator for Ragnarok Online.

Main features to be added: Account Clustering, Facebook and OpenID authentication, Live Vending

### Download
```
$ Latest Revision: https://github.com/missxantara/athena-cp
$ Item Images: http://web.artistic-coder.com/FluxCP-item-v2.zip
```

### License
To be updated

### Requirements
PHP 5.2+

PDO and PDO-MYSQL extensions for PHP5 (including PHP_MYSQL support)

MySQL 5+

Optional: GD2 (for guild emblems and registration CAPTCHA)

Optional: Tidy (for cleaner HTML output)

Optional: mod_rewrite support for UseCleanUrls feature

### Authors and Contributors
Xantara (@missxantara) - Author

CalciumKid (@calciumkid) - Contributor of FluxCP-Renewal

Matthew Harris and Nikunj Mehta - Author of the original Flux Control Panel

rAthena - Source

latheesan - Updated Item & Collection 2011 item images

### Support
Wiki: https://github.com/missxantara/athena-cp/wiki

Report bugs: https://github.com/missxantara/athena-cp/issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
